name: Project J.O.Y.
description:
Project J.O.Y. is an unsettling puzzle game with a darker secret.

You play as a parent who's child has mysteriously disappeared after dropping them off at a seemingly-small daycare. After breaking into the building, you already quickly realize this place isn't as small as you thought and there is no one to be found. What dark secret does this place hold?

This project was made for school within 4 months using the Unity engine.

Might continue working on it after school, feedback is always appreciated!
